record.title: HONORING JUDGE RICHARD ARNOLD
record.narrative:
HONORING JUDGE RICHARD ARNOLD -- (House of Representatives - September 27, 2007)

[Page: H10944]
(Mr. SNYDER asked and was given permission to address the House for 1 minute.)

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, people in Arkansas who knew of Judge Richard Arnold admired and respected his great legal mind, his integrity, and his remarkable attributes as a human being. Everyone who personally knew him liked him. Not even those who disagreed with him found fault with his judicial demeanor nor his legal analysis.

Now we have an opportunity to honor this great man. Tomorrow in Little Rock will be the formal dedication of the Richard Sheppard Arnold United States Courthouse, a wonderful new facility. Not only will this building be a great site for justice in central Arkansas, but it will be a lasting tribute to Judge Arnold. And on this day also we honor his wonderful wife, Kay Kelley Arnold, who will be in attendance at tomorrow's dedication.
